nodes.text: Waleed Nagma was a male native of the planet Monsolar, where as a child he became infested by a Syrox parasite. His attempts at having the parasite removed ended with him being incarcerated in the prison known as Cog Hive Seven, where the parasite continued to grow inside of him. Nagma had another inmate, known as Zero, smuggle in a bulb of Anzati snot garlic, which he used to draw the creature out from within him, after which Zero killed it. Nagma himself was later killed during a gladiatorial match in the prison.
